resources.string: Sorry we cannot detect an internet connection. Please reconnect and try again
Sorry we cannot detect an internet connection. Please reconnect and try again
Keep your Bluetooth ON and help the authorities prevent the spread of COVID-19
Bluetooth is ON - I am ready to help!
Enter your mobile number\nto receive a One-Time-PIN (OTP)
Please update your app to continue
Sorry! You device doesn\'t support for scanning feature. But still you can continue and update your status.

Together We Can application is
developed by the Government of
Sri Lanka to fight back this deadly
pandemic of COVID-19.

We understand the sensitive nature of the data you provide via this application. Therefore, measures have taken to ensure that your data is not compromised. All data will be handled by officials of the Government of Sri Lanka under strict security measures.

It is recommend to set your Location permission setting for this application to ‘Always’. You can change the settings anytime later. Please note that your GPS location will not be acquired by the app. Your location permission will only be used for the BLE scanning process as per Google restrictions.
Bluetooth monitors your device\'s proximity to another device. It is recommended to keep it ON all times.
Your data will be only shared with the government of Sri Lanka. Your name, number or any other details you provide on this application will not be disclosed.

This mobile application is developed under the supervision of Government of Sri Lanka as bold step of prevention of spreading COVID-19 virus within the country. Your contribution is highly appreciated at this time and it is your responsibility as a citizen of a proud nation.
Enter the four digit PIN you just received to %1$s
How can you do your part in preventing the spread of COVID-19?
With just a click! Select the option which best describes your current status

Thank you for being a responsible citizen and doing your part to prevent the spread of the virus COVID-19. Please make sure you keep this application open (on power saver mode) especially when in public places such as supermarkets, buses, meetings or hospitals.
Upload my recent contacts to authorities
Share this app with friends and family
Total number of individuals in hospitals
You have been identified as infected or exposed to a contagious person

string.name: tap_here_to_upload_your_data_u
string.u: Tap here to upload your data

resources.string: If you are contacted by an authority to provide the data you have collected in the past few days, please tap the button below to upload your data to us.\n\nBy uploading, you agree to share the close proximity contact data that you have collected for the past few days. This data does contain neither location data nor direct contact details of anyone. Authorities do not collect any of your personal information.
We haven’t collected enough information to upload. Please try again later.
Contact us through the following request sheet to get assistance from our authorities. We will try our best to contact you as soon as possible.
We have received your request successfully. Please stay at home and contact us if you require more food. We will get in touch with you as soon as possible. Thank you!
We have received your request successfully. Please stay at home and contact us if the symptoms get escalated. We will get in touch with you as soon as possible. Thank you!
We have received your request successfully. Please stay at home and contact us if you require any assistance. We will get in touch with you as soon as possible. Thank you!
You can make %1$d more requests for today
You have reached your daily limit
Join the fight against COVID-19 with this app\n%1$s
Scanner not running! Please make sure Bluetooth is ON and required permissions are granted
By pressing submit button below, hereby I provide my consent and permission for the authorities to save my contact details to provide assistance.
Since location access has not been granted, this app will not be able to discover nearby devices.
